程序包 view

类 AdministratorView

Object
DashboardView
AdministratorView
所有已实现的接口:
ISubscriber, IView
public class AdministratorView extends DashboardView
The AdministratorView class extends the DashboardView and provides the user interface for the administrator. It allows the administrator to manage hospital staff, view and manage medication inventory, approve replenishment requests, view appointment details, and handle notifications.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    private List<Notification>
    notifications
    The list of notifications received by the administrator.
    private User
    user
    The user associated with this AdministratorView.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    launch()
    Displays a menu with a set of actions that the administrator can choose from, including: Show notifications View staff Manage staff View appointment details View medication inventory Manage medication inventory Approve replenishment request Change password Logout The method runs in a while loop, i.e., it repeatedly displays the menu after the administrator completes an action until logout.
    void
    showAddHospitalStaffForm()
    Displays a form to add a new staff member (Doctor or Pharmacist).
    void
    showAppointmentDetails()
    Displays the details of all appointments, including patient ID, doctor ID, status, date of appointment, and outcome record (if any).
    void
    showApproveReplenishmentRequestForm()
    Displays the form to approve a replenishment request for a medication by the medication ID.
    void
    showHospitalStaff()
    Displays a menu for filtering hospital staff members based on different criteria.
    void
    showHospitalStaffByAge()
    Displays a list of details of hospital staff members filtered by their ages.
    void
    showHospitalStaffByGender()
    Displays a list of details of hospital staff members filtered by their genders.
    void
    showHospitalStaffByName()
    Displays a list of details of hospital staff members filtered by their names.
    void
    showHospitalStaffByRole()
    Displays a list of details of hospital staff members filtered by their role (Doctor or Pharmacist).
    void
    showManageHospitalStaffForm()
    Displays a menu for managing hospital staff.
    void
    showManageMedicationInventoryForm()
    Displays the form for managing the medication inventory.
    void
    showMedicationInventory()
    Displays the medication inventory details, including the medication ID, name, stock level, low stock level alert line, whether replenishment is being requested, and the price of each medication.
    void
    showRemoveHospitalStaffForm()
    Displays a form to remove a staff member by the staff ID
    void
    showUpdateHospitalStaffForm()
    Displays a form to update the details of a staff member (Doctor or Pharmacist).
    void

    Implements the ISubscriber interface.

  • 字段详细资料

    • user

      private User user
      The user associated with this AdministratorView.

    • notifications

      private List<Notification> notifications
      The list of notifications received by the administrator.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • AdministratorView

      public AdministratorView(User user)
      Constructor for the AdministratorView class. Initializes the notifications list and subscribes to the AppointmentStore.
      参数:
      user - The user associated with this AdministratorView.

  • 方法详细资料

    • update

      public void update(Notification notification)
      Implements the ISubscriber interface. Updates the list of notifications when receiving a new notification from subscribed publishers.
      参数:
      notification - The new notification to be added to the list.

    • launch

      public void launch()
      Displays a menu with a set of actions that the administrator can choose from, including:
      • Show notifications
      • View staff
      • Manage staff
      • View appointment details
      • View medication inventory
      • Manage medication inventory
      • Approve replenishment request
      • Change password
      • Logout
      The method runs in a while loop, i.e., it repeatedly displays the menu after the administrator completes an action until logout.

    • showHospitalStaff

      public void showHospitalStaff()
      Displays a menu for filtering hospital staff members based on different criteria. The administrator can choose to filter by role, age, gender, or name.

    • showHospitalStaffByRole

      public void showHospitalStaffByRole()
      Displays a list of details of hospital staff members filtered by their role (Doctor or Pharmacist).

    • showHospitalStaffByAge

      public void showHospitalStaffByAge()
      Displays a list of details of hospital staff members filtered by their ages.

    • showHospitalStaffByGender

      public void showHospitalStaffByGender()
      Displays a list of details of hospital staff members filtered by their genders.

    • showHospitalStaffByName

      public void showHospitalStaffByName()
      Displays a list of details of hospital staff members filtered by their names. The matching is case-insensitive.

    • showManageHospitalStaffForm

      public void showManageHospitalStaffForm()
      Displays a menu for managing hospital staff. It provides options to add, update, or remove a staff member. Based on the administrator's choice, it navigates to the respective form.

    • showAddHospitalStaffForm

      public void showAddHospitalStaffForm()
      Displays a form to add a new staff member (Doctor or Pharmacist). The administrator should provide the following details:
      • Name
      • Gender (Male/Female)
      • Age
      • Email
      If the new staff member is Doctor, the administrator needs to specify the Specialty of the new doctor.

    • showUpdateHospitalStaffForm

      public void showUpdateHospitalStaffForm()
      Displays a form to update the details of a staff member (Doctor or Pharmacist). The administrator should provide the staff ID before updating.
      The administrator can update the following details or skip updating them:
      • Name
      • Gender
      • Age
      • Email
      • Specialty (Doctor only)

    • showRemoveHospitalStaffForm

      public void showRemoveHospitalStaffForm()
      Displays a form to remove a staff member by the staff ID

    • showAppointmentDetails

      public void showAppointmentDetails()
      Displays the details of all appointments, including patient ID, doctor ID, status, date of appointment, and outcome record (if any).

    • showMedicationInventory

      public void showMedicationInventory()
      Displays the medication inventory details, including the medication ID, name, stock level, low stock level alert line, whether replenishment is being requested, and the price of each medication.

    • showManageMedicationInventoryForm

      public void showManageMedicationInventoryForm()
      Displays the form for managing the medication inventory. The administrator can choose to add a new medication, remove an existing medication, update the stock level or the low stock level alert line of a medication.

    • showApproveReplenishmentRequestForm

      public void showApproveReplenishmentRequestForm()
      Displays the form to approve a replenishment request for a medication by the medication ID.
